    • Method Detail

      • login

        public User login(long userId,
         int pin)
           throws AtmInvalidUserException
        Login a user User provides their ATM card which contains their user info (first name, last name, account number). User enters pin. User must be a valid user for that account AND pin must be valid.
        Parameters:
        userId - User Id to login with
        pin - Unique PIN tied to user
        Returns:
        true if valid user
        Throws:
        AtmInvalidUserException

      • authenticate

        private User authenticate(LoginRequest request)
                   throws AtmInvalidUserException
        Performs the authentication
        Parameters:
        request - LoginRequest reference
        Returns:
        A user if authentication is successful
        Throws:
        AtmInvalidUserException

      • trace

        private void trace(java.lang.String msg)
